message: Let's start with a fair split. You can try to do better in the next round!
I think we can both do a bit better than that.  Let's split it 60/40 in my favor,  since I get to make the offer this round.  Fair is fair!
Not so fast, Bob! I think I can do better than that. You rejected my first offer, now it's my turn to make a better one.
You're not getting a free pass, Bob! I'm offering a slightly better deal than your last one. Don't think you can just dictate the terms.
